title: About me

title: About me
text:
Education
Nord University | Norway PhD in Finance | 2016 - 2020
BI Norwegian Business School | Norway Master in Finance | 2013 - 2015

title: Vu Le Tran, PhD
text:
I have played a key role in the performance and growth of the NorQuant Multi-Asset, which holds a 5-star Morningstar rating. Currently, I contribute to managing pension portfolios for Gjensidige Pensjon Forsikring AS, overseeing assets under management totaling $7 billion as of 2024.
I have published several research articles on empirical asset pricing, ESG, climate risk, and sustainable investment. These articles, funded by the Norwegian Research Council, have been recognized by top academic journals.
Additionally, I am honored to serve as a board member for the Norwegian Association for Quantitative Finance. I am always seeking new opportunities to apply my expertise in a dynamic and innovative environment. Thank you for visiting, and I look forward to exploring the possibilities together.
